links_reviews_text: Wore this to Christmas Eve dinner and it was a perfect neutral. You really have to be mindful when you sit as to not bend the sequins. It is heavy because the sequins are metal. It was big in the waist for me, so it had to keep adjusting because the weight of it pulled it down, but overall it was a fun wear!

If I had more places to wear it to, I would have purchased this. I caus-ed it up to a company party and I got sooooo many compliments. It wasn’t to fancy cause the sequences are sort of matte and it just worked perfect!

LOVE this skirt. It makes you smile, want to twirl, and feel better than your best self. I wore this to a conference and received so many comments - I didn't want to take it off at the end of the night. I wore this with a silky black tank, black leather jacket and black booties.
This skirt is a must for your sassy event! I absolutely loved it and had so much fun wearing it to our Noonday Ambassador Conference called SHINE and a Spurs Game.
Such a great skirt!
Perfect for NYE!

Loved this skirt, it was super high impact on. I ordered this as an option for NYE or any other holiday gathering that popped up but didn't end up wearing it. The skirt was super heavy, so it tended to get dragged down off of my waist down my hips which made me look wider than I would have if it stayed in place on my smallest part. Ultimately clothes like this skirt are exactly why I rent now, it was a great statement piece that I played around with, and ultimately returned when I was done with it!

This was a very pretty skirt, but it was not super comfortable (I mean, surprise, there's like 89035890 pieces of gold metal involved) and it didn't hold up all that well. I noticed I left a trail of left behind gold bits as I went about my day. Also my brother asked me if it was chain mail and if I were preparing for an archery attack. I thought it looked super cute though.
Rent this skirt! It's so pretty and very heavy/high quality. Wore on Christmas and felt very festive.
Loved this, almost bought it at Anthro full price! The only issue I had was that the sequins kept cutting my calf.
It’s heavy—there’s some substance to this skirt. Easily dressed up/down
Was perfect for holiday parties!
The skirt for well and was flattering. However, the fabric was so heavy it was hard for me to wear. I was also afraid the gold pieces would break off with activity of daily life.

This skirt is super cool in theory, but the fabric was very thick and made me look about 15 lbs heavier. Not flattering at all. Also, significantly longer on me than the model - more of a maxi skirt. Didn't wear it.
The sequins on this are really pretty but the waist runs small (and is quite heavy). Could not wear.

This item was too big to wear. I go between sizes 16/18, but the 16 was unavailable, so I risked the 18. This piece is very high quality, and heavy weight. The lining inside the skirt was very soft and silky. I will be keeping an eye on this to try the 16 if it becomes available.

Debated on going down a size but decided to buy/ keep. Super cute & perfect stretch for cozy! Negative side is they do stretch out after 1 wear, positive side is that during Covid-19 “stay at home” I was comfortable in theses as much as leggings & sweats. And a girl can get tired of leggings & sweats.
These jeans had the exact right amount of stretch for me and were super cute with everything. I’m typically a size 12 and these were the perfect fit.
For well and liked the small threaded details.
Never tried this brand before but wore them all the time and very flattering. Great post baby too.

links_reviews_title: Lighter fabric and does not run large
links_reviews_text: I was very excited to try these jeans and sized up as reviews recommended. For me, they were biggest in the waist - which is usually my problem area - and also were very faded. Finally, the horizontal pocket line made my hips look quite wide, which isn't a problem I usually have. Love this brand but these jeans were a big miss for me and I couldn't wear them.
I liked these jeans a lot! I kind of regret not keeping them and buying them.

Liked these but didn't love them. They were too short on me at 5'8", and tight all the way down. (I have big calves and like a little give at the bottom.) I still wore them - the Pilcro brand is flattering on me in general- but had to wear taller boots. Won't rent them again.
Great fit, good quality denim!
I wore these several times. They fit great, and have unique seamed detail. Just a little hard to keep the seams straight while wearing. The left and right legs weren't always even.
I liked the fun seaming details. The stretch was so comfy but lost its shape after a few wears.
For me, I think these would have fit better if I was more hourglass or more pear shaped. So for me these were tight in the waist but not as tight in the hips and thighs that I would have liked.
Legs were too skinny for me. Was able to wear but I was uncomfortable.
Loved these so I bought them! The seaming is very flattering and slimming.
Loved. Very flattering and true to size.

links_reviews_title: different fit from my other Pilcro and the Letterpress jeans
links_reviews_text: Loved the wash and the crop length. Quality material. It was tighter in the waste than I was expecting because of the fit of my other Pilcro and the Letterpress jeans. I ordered the same size and found they were a little too tight in the waste for my personal preference.

Though these are called leggings, they’re definitely made of a very structured denim material. Overall I found them very stylish and flattering. They look great with oversized tops given a French tuck. I styled them with ankle boots and sneakers. My only complaint is that I found myself tugging at the legs to keep them from creeping up during the day. Otherwise, a great look.
Too tight and not enough stretch. Need a pant that moves with me.
I loved the color and seam detail of these. Worked with almost anything. Totally comfy to boot!

Love these jeans! The seams make them unique, but nothing too crazy. I wore these a ton and want to buy, but would like to get a different size. Love them so much, will probably add to my next bag :) TTS and didn't stretch out during the time I wore.
Ran small and did not like all the seams.

links_reviews_title: Easy to wear - seams give them extra
links_reviews_text: Super comfortable. Ankle length on 5'5". Denim was great color. Only complaint - they loosened up pretty quickly.

I enjoyed the color, denim/legging feel, and the high waist. The downside is length would vary depending on person. These hit about 6inches above my ankle bone. I am 5’10” but I can typically get away with a regular inseam. I don’t mind for this time of year because of long socks and boots. But length would be the only reason I gave 4 instead of 5 stars

There denim leggings have a stretchy fabric and high waisted. Since they are leggings they are form fitting, I may go up a size if I rent again for more room in the waist. I think these are really unique due to the seaming details in the front and hits above the ankle.
super comfortable and flattering. it has great details in the belt and cuffs

Loved this jumpsuit! I wore it several times (before Corona virus hit) and got compliments on it everytime! I probably could've done with my usual size 10, but the 8 fit surprisingly well. Just a liiiiiiittle snug/short in the sleeves, but I rolled them anyways!

I sized up one size on this jumpsuit and it fit perfectly. It wasn't too long for me either, which I was worried about. I ran into an acquaintance while wearing it and she was wearing the same one. We are totally different body types (she's tall and willowy, I'm shorter and curvy) and had styled the jumpsuit differently, but we both looked great!
Super cute and perfect fit!
This was basically one of my favorite outfits ever! It was so fun and easy. I got so so so many compliments on it.

I adored this jumpsuit! It was a perfect one-piece for when I was too lazy to pick out an outfit. Comfortable and cute, but it's buttons so takes a bit longer when you're trying to take it off to pee :)

I love the color and softness of this fabric, as well as the general shape. Unfortunately it runs much too short, not only in leg and torso length, but arm length as well. It fit me everywhere else, but was unwearable.

links_reviews_title: Felt like a total boss in this!!
links_reviews_text: Took a risk and wore this jumpsuit to work and it made me feel powerful and awesome! I love the slightly androgynous vibe and the material was soft and comfortable

Love love love this jumpsuit! First of all, it’s literally one piece and you’re out the door which is amaze. Second it fit so well, was very flattering and I got so many compliments! I wore it with sneakers, loafers and booties and all were great. Highly recommend

links_reviews_title: Great fit, even for longer torso and legs
links_reviews_text: I find it very hard to find jumpsuits that fit my longer proportions and I was very happy that this fit so well. Comfortable and dressy casual. Felt a little worn but still good quality. Would rent again or even possibly buy

I LOVE THIS JUMPSUIT. Sooo many compliments, so comfortable, and actually very light too. I was worries the material would be heavy but it was lovely. Paired it with sneakers and boots and wore it literally everywhere. Strongly considered buying it.

links_reviews_title: Work to weekend and so many compliments
links_reviews_text: This was such a winner - I wore it on a weekend trip and kept getting stopped, I wore it to work and similarly got a lot of love for it. Super comfortable and well-fitted, not too difficult to take on and off
Fun to wear and romp around in. I wore it work and brunches with friends.

I loved this jumpsuit so much. It fit perfectly and wasn't too complicated to take on and off. I wore it with white sneakers and some fun statement earrings. Would definitely rent again. The material was a bit thinner than I would have preferred for winter time but it worked on warmer winter days.

links_reviews_title: Would be perfect if offered in tall
links_reviews_text: I must have liked this one, since I wore it again and again. Received lots of compliments. Very comfy, lightweight cord material. Saw someone else wearing it at a restaurant with a red beaded necklace and they looked smashing together, so I started wearing it with different colored statement necklaces to make it a little more feminine. Only wish it was offered in tall; it was a little short in the crotch and legs and very short in the arms.
This is perfect. I wore it a ton and got a ton of compliments every time. Comfortable, bossy, sexy. Perfect mix.

A fun piece to add to your causal mix. The patterned cuff on the sleeves and the belt are nice touches. The shape and solid color sometimes made me feel not as femme, so would recommend accessories (jewelry/scarf) and bright shoes. Quality of the fabric felt average with some loose threads here and there.

links_reviews_title: Not that flattering, needs some color or something.
links_reviews_text: Did not like that much
Was goign to style with tight turtle neck under and booties. Was super cute, but didn't end up wearing on trip
In love with everything about this piece. The corduroy is more comfortable than I thought, as it is fairly lightweight. Fit was great, material great, easy to style. Love!

This jumpsuit is absolute perfection! I can't recommend it enough! The texture of the corduroy made the utility look a bit more elevated. I wore it to work and out with friends. I'm normally a 4, but got a 6 since 4 was unavailable. The 4 would've fit, but I liked the look sizing up created. I styled it with mock necks underneath and cuffed the sleeves and legs. I'm 5'3" and did not have to cuff it - it came right to my ankles. It's incredibly comfortable to wear all day long. I wear a ton of jumpsuits, but this is by far the best I've ever worn!
Perfect jumpsuit! Comfortable, stylish, true to size, flattering.
I would have loved to wear this, if I weren't somehow too tall for this item. Is has a cool look, great corduroy material and the color is beautiful.

I really loved this! I got lots of compliments at work wearing this. My only warnings to others is: It’s a very short length. I’m actually pretty short and found that while sitting the pants don’t come down as far as I’d like, so tall girls take warning! I would’ve preferred the legs be too long and then could’ve cuffed them which would’ve been cute. I also felt like I looked a bit like a train conductor or custodial staff at times as well. Overall, a cute look and doesn’t take much effort to look cohesive and stylish! Just throw it on! The color in my photo looks darker than it does in person. In person it’s definitely a navy blue as shown in the product image.

This fit great but felt really thin, not how corduroy normally feels. I also noticed some strings were hanging off of it. It's an easy piece to wear, but would have been much better in Fall or Spring.

links_reviews_title: Best Jumpsuit! Very comfortable and flattering.
links_reviews_text: Great fit and super easy to wear. I styled it for work and for going out. Very versatile.

I’ve been looking at this trend and avoiding it since all the denim ones look like you’re headed to the mechanic shop. What better way then nuuly to give it a try I thought and got this one, thanks to the reviews. It’s soft and flowy, not stiff like the denim ones. Very flattering and the little detail on the sleeves goes a long way. I’m pretty short but even the length worked. Loving them, and so easy to wear as it’s a whole outfit.
Liked this, didn’t love it. Did get compliments on it though.
Got this as a sub and it was surprisingly really flattering. The cord fabric was pretty lightweight so it kind of stretched in the knees and legs but it was comfortable and I got lots so compliments.

Ended up cuffing the pants and wearing with oxfords, and received all the compliments at work! I highly recommend this piece, and was so pleased that I had to keep it. :)
A great quality piece. Jumpsuits are hit or miss with my height but this one was successful. I had trouble pairing it with shoes to be honest.
Very flattering and easy to style

really cute! Ran a tad large, but I liked the larger fit.

Loved this jumpsuit so much I bought it. I was a bit nervous about a jumpsuit bc most don’t really fit me. This one was perfect. I have a larger butt/thighs but smaller waist and the belt helped a lot. I was between 2 and 4 and went with the 2 and there was plenty of room.
This vivid jumper makes getting dressed a breeze; however, if you are tall the jumper is waaay too short. Most of my shins were exposed when I sat.

links_reviews_title: So cute but not bathroom compatible
links_reviews_text: I’m a 10-12 and the size 10 fit me to perfection. It was quite short on me (hit mid to low calf) but I styled by day with flats and nude heels at night and I thought it looked great both ways. The only issue I had was with using the restroom. The top is button down with a belt and a zipper below the waist, so taking it off to use the ladies room was a full blown process!!

I felt mildly like a mechanic/janitor but the detail on the sleeve made this outfit super cute. Got lots of compliments, and it was comfy, though the fabric is soft (not stiff) so it wrinkled a little and picked up a lot of hair. Wore it to work with booties.

It’s perfectly comfortably, with an amazing fit. I buttoned it up to the very first button with matching box-leather pumps for a very cadet look. The belt can be cinched tight around the waist to give it classic feminine appeal.
Loved the weight of this and it was perfect for a casual NYE a party. I had to roll up the sleeves because they were short but it worked. Overall a very nice jumpsuit.

I threw this item in my nuuly on a whim and it ended up being the favorite item this month! Corduroy is thin enough to not feel bulky and the proportions/cut worked even though I am short w/ an athletic build and have had issues with jumpsuits fit in the past. The cropped pant and sleeves made it feel extra feminine and work well if you are on the petite side. Seriously considering keeping this one!

Nice and light- perfect for southern winters- where it’s 30deg in the am and 66 by the afternoon. I’m a huge fan of rompers, so this was a win. Not sure I’d wear it again, but it was a nice basic romper.
this jumpsuit is super fun and cool. its a little thin, which i didnt mind.
This was adorable - the details, the material. There was just little too much fabric around the belly and waist which will be unflattering on anyone who is petite.

links_reviews_title: I’m not a big corduroy fan...
links_reviews_text: However, this jumpsuit became one of my go to favorite outfits while traveling in Europe over the holidays. It was warm, comfortable, and easy to get on and off. The sleeve length was a little short on me, so I layered with a long sleeve shirt underneath, cardigan sweater and paired with a flat boot.
This jumpsuit is adorable! I absolutely loved it, strongly considering buying it. Great flattering fit, love the fabric too

I was nervous because this jumpsuit didn't have any reviews but I am glad I pulled the trigger. This is the best item in my bag and wore it so many times. I am usually a size 4 and it was a tiny bit baggy but I liked it that way. If you want it tighter then size down.

These pants were my favorite item in my Nuuly. I would have bought them had I not found them on sale at Anthro in my size for cheaper :) They were so flattering and fun, and I loved the length of them and how they show your shoes instead of hide them. I did rent a petite size but probably could have gone either way and they'd still look good because of the design of the pant.

These pants are super sexy, flattering, and flowy. The only thing I didn't like about it was the work-pants material. Great for if you are wearing them to work, but I wish they were a more comfy and stretchy material to use as lounge pants.

I tried these on at Anthro in a 4 regular, but they were too long/loose. The difference between the regular and petite sizing is REALLY different-- I could barely get these on! The style is great so Im considering ordering the 4R pair and getting them tailored.

links_reviews_title: The most flattering pants I now own
links_reviews_text: Loved these pants and the ability to dress them up and down. Flattering for tall ladies and the perfect pants for a fun statement heel.

Too small, didn’t wear If you have thighs and a booty, the wide mid calf cut/tight around butt isn’t super flattering either
got the petite sizing to fit my short frame but was too short for me especially with the super flared leg

Cute, just no stretch to accommodate my hourglass hip to waist. Hight waist, fun shorter length in the front, and longer in the back. Would try in larger size but length would be too long to rent and not hem.
I really liked these but had a difficult time deciding what to wear them with as far as tops and shoes since the pants are so unique. There was also no give in the fabric whatsoever.
These almost fit and were almost perfect -- but ultimately I found them too tight on my thighs (no stretch) and too lose on the waist. Just a weird fit.

Very fun pants but also very different. They add a unique element to a professional outfit. The bell bottoms were very wide though, sometimes would get caught under my feet while sitting so when I stood up I'd be standing on my pants so a little awkward.
Made business casual have a little more fun than usual.

I really liked how these looked on me, but there was NO give in the material, so they felt kind of tight and would have been difficult to sit and move in. I dont think I would have even sized up because then they would probably look too baggy.
Wore these for a studio 54 themed NYE party along with a sequin top - fit great!
Too big, too much fabric

When they arrived the fit was not the same, they were stretched causing them not to fit the same way even though they were the same exact size I tried on in the store. I thought about buying new from the store then decided to wear something else. Well made & the fabric is very nice, they flow nicely. If I were in a situation where I had more functions to attend I would try in a future box.
I liked these pants and i think they are a super fun style. I loved how they looked but they were hard to style with the right shirt and shoes. pants that need to be worn for s specific event.
I enjoyed these flare trousers. Im very curvy so they fit somewhat snug around the booty and thighs area.
If you are from somewhere cold like me, this is the perfect date night outfit during the winter!

Oh so classy with a touch of Stevie Nicks. These pants felt great- comfortable, flowy, and really dressed up an outfit. I wore them once with flats- the bottom of the pant dusted the floor slightly!
Love love love these so much. Wore them throughout the holidays styled so many different ways. I'm very petite and found that the 00 was the perfect fit. Will be purchasing!

Loved this dress , the perfect length. The belted waist created a slimming affect on my waist!
